summary: Batch 1 seeding acknowledged: baseline frozen, five Alfa instances (Alfa-M01...Alfa-M05) staged with readiness + smoke evidence, hello reports generated, and ledger updated. Final hydration into individual genesis workspaces now queued.

notes: Baseline tag forge-alfa@2025-11-13-054 captured with commit ec6a93c.
Instances Alfa-M01...Alfa-M05 created under production/mass_alfa_batch1/alfa_m0X/ with ID->path mapping in instances.json.
Focus areas mapped to genesis-delta/theta/zeta/kappa/lambda slots.
Each instance README documents high_command_exchange wiring and target workspace path (e.g., golf_00/delta_16/alfaM01).
Shared RUNBOOK + exchange cadence captured in baseline freeze.
Readiness run 2025-11-13T18:23:23Z copied into per-instance logs/readiness.json.
Minimal smoke captured via tools/factory_order_emitter.py --help for each instance (logs/smoke.txt).
Awaiting exchange_all push to mirror hello reports + ack to hub.
This document serves as the Batch 1 factory report ahead of hub sync.

entries: 2025-11-13 18:25 Toyfoundry ORDER-054 Batch 1 seeding in motion...

open_follow_ups: Hydrate Delta/Theta/Zeta/Kappa/Lambda workspaces and rerun readiness per instance.
Push hello reports + ack via tools/exchange_all.py and confirm hub receipt.
Draft Batch 1 throughput metrics once individual workspaces emit telemetry.
